title: Kellie's Diary #1
description: ***UPDATE 3/8/15: This book now contains a text version at the end.A series of diary entries through the eyes of a little girl as she tries to survive the end of the world.This story is told from the viewpoint of 9-year-old Kellie, a typical third-grade girl living her life as anyone else would, and she shares her daily activities with her diary. When the world crumbles and the dead walk, Kellie struggles to survive and find her way home, all the while sharing her tale with her diary.
author: Thomas  Jenner
